item.title: Get next Github project version
item.description: Here is a script to find out the next suggested SemVer versions for a Github project. The script works on both private and public repositories. If using a private repo, you need to export an environment variable named GITHUB_PAT with the value of your github personal access token. This script depends mainly on the git tags. If you use a custom prefix for your git tags, you need to provide it as an option.

item.title: Home Wifi with CDMA modem
item.description: In case CDMA technology is still offered in your area, this post might be useful to you in setting up a simple Home WiFi using a CDMA modem, WiFi router and a Linux machine. This could be a good excercise to revive your old Linux box and that old WiFi router which had been laying useless :-). What you need Linux machine - An old Debian / Ubuntu Linux pc will do too.
